title: Create restaurant website with menu, about, and contact pages

requirements.text: Create a home page displaying restaurant welcome message 'Welcome to Our Restaurant üçΩÔ∏è', tagline 'We serve fresh, tasty, and affordable food every day', description about being a perfect place for family, friends, and food lovers, using fresh ingredients and cooking with care, with service highlights: dine in or take away, friendly service, clean and comfortable environment, and a call-to-action 'Visit us today and enjoy delicious food!'

quotes: We serve fresh, tasty, and affordable food every day
Visit us today and enjoy delicious food!

acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays the welcome heading with emoji
Service highlights are displayed with checkmark emojis

requirements.text: Create a menu page with three sections: Main Dishes (Chicken Biryani $5, Beef Curry $6, Fried Rice $4, Chicken Burger $4), Fast Food (Pizza $7, French Fries $2, Sandwich $3), and Drinks (Cold Drinks $1, Fresh Juice $2, Water $0.5), with all prices editable by admin
acceptanceCriteria: Menu displays three distinct sections with category emojis
All menu items display name and price
Admin can edit prices for any menu item
Price changes persist after page reload

requirements.text: Create an About Us page describing the restaurant as a local restaurant serving the community with love and care, with goals to provide fresh and quality food, good taste at a fair price, and friendly customer service, including the message 'We believe good food brings people together' and 'Thank you for choosing our restaurant'

quotes: We are a local restaurant serving our community with love and care
We believe good food brings people together
Thank you for choosing our restaurant

acceptanceCriteria: About page displays the restaurant description
Three main goals are listed clearly

requirements.text: Create a contact page displaying address placeholder 'Your Street Name, Your Area, Your City', phone number placeholder '+880 1XXXXXXXXX', opening hours 'Everyday: 10:00 AM ‚Äì 10:00 PM', and email placeholder 'yourrestaurant@email.com', with all contact information editable by admin

quotes: Your Street Name, Your Area, Your City

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays all four contact information fields with appropriate icons
Admin can edit address, phone, hours, and email
Updated contact information persists after page reload

requirements.text: Implement navigation to allow users to switch between Home, Menu, About Us, and Contact pages
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu is visible on all pages
Users can navigate between all four pages
Active page is visually indicated in navigation

requirements.text: Design a warm, inviting visual theme for a family-friendly restaurant with a cohesive color palette using warm earth tones (amber, terracotta, cream), readable typography, and layout that emphasizes food imagery and hospitality
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses warm, welcoming tones throughout
Typography is clear and readable for menu items and content
Layout creates an inviting, family-friendly atmosphere

constraints: All pricing and contact information must be stored in backend and editable
Use single-actor Motoko architecture for backend
